name: May & Yam 2
overview: Avoid the nasties like the crapmonster, the burning sun and the weedmonster and gather all the goodies like flowers, game disks and hearts. There are 8 worlds to explore and a password save function. Game by Gavilian Ruiz aka Hawk aka focataku of the group Future Brain. This is a sequel to May & Yam 1, which was only for two players.
